text: , son of Masaie, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the Muromachi period (1336–1573). He held a regent position kampaku from 1493 to 1497 and from 1513 to 1514. Taneie was his son. A daughter of his was a consort of samurai Hōjō Ujitsuna. ==References== * Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family Category:1472 births Category:1544 deaths
title: Konoe Hisamichi
